mapper.insert: insert into sys_admin(id, nick_name, account, avatar, pwd, enable_status, create_by, create_time) values (#{id}, #{nickName}, #{account}, #{avatar}, #{pwd}, #{enableStatus}, #{createBy}, NOW())
mapper.update: update from sys_admin set enable_status=#{enableStatus}, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=NOW() where id = #{id}
update sys_admin set pwd = #{pwd}, update_by = #{updateBy} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT id, nick_name, account, avatar, enable_status FROM sys_admin
and nick_name like concat('%', #{nickName}, '%')
and account like concat('%', #{account}, '%')
and enable_status = #{enableStatus}
SELECT id, account FROM sys_admin WHERE account = (select account from sys_admin where id = #{id} and enable_status = 1) and enable_status = 0
